metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9915 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An access issue existed in Content Security Policy. This issue wasaddressed with improved access restrictions. This issue is fixed in iOS13.6 and iPadOS 13.6, tvOS 13.4.8, watchOS 6.2.8, Safari 13.1.2, iTunes12.10.8 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.3, iCloud for Windows 7.20.Processing maliciously crafted web content may prevent Content SecurityPolicy from being enforced.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9915` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.28.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
